question: 描く
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>draw</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to draw</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to sketch</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>書く</ja>, which is similar to drawing something (you use a writing instrument on a piece of paper, which you can do with drawing). Another reading is <ja>えがく</ja>, which is like saying <ja>絵を書く</ja>, but combined and rendaku'd.
